metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21253 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In multiple locations, there is a possible way to crash multiple system services due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to local denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
